Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐对甲虫族的看法
鼠族人说，与甲虫族进行有价值的贸易，所以我们尊重，即使几丁质是皮肤。为什么大自然会造出贝壳皮肤？ 为什么允许恐怖行为？ 还是认为应该做违法的事。
Texts.Eng: Kirhos says valuable trade with Mantizi, and so we respect even if chitin is skin. Why is nature make shell skin? Why is terror-people even allowed? Still think should make illegal.

Texts.Chs: 这些甲虫人的恐怖人们不像蚁族人那样可怕。更好的昆虫，没有肉 - 吃相同的方式。而且，更加文明。喜欢谈天说地，能工善造，少杀戮，少吃东西。 还是不好吃。不要尝试品尝。
Texts.Eng: These Mantizi terror-people not as scary as the Thelusians. Nicer insects that not flesh-eat the same way. Also, more civilized. Prefer talk and talk and make and make, less killing and eating. Still not going to be delicious. Not try to taste.
